Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.intro_text: We take the protection of your personal data very seriously. This privacy policy informs you about the type, scope, and purpose of processing personal data within our online offer.
Privacy.collection_logs_text: The provider of the pages automatically collects and stores information in server log files (IP address, browser type, referrer URL, time). This data is technically necessary.
Privacy.collection_auth_text: We store the data provided by you during registration (email, name, password hash) to provide your user account.
Privacy.sharing_text: To provide our services, we use the following partners:
Privacy.stripe_desc: Stripe (Payments): Data is transferred to Stripe to process payments.
Privacy.resend_desc: Resend (Email): For sending system emails (e.g., password reset).
Privacy.sentry_desc: Sentry (Error Tracking): To improve stability, we collect anonymized error reports.
Privacy.rights_text: You have the right at any time to access, correct, delete, and transfer your data stored by us. Contact {email} for this.
Privacy.cookies_text: We only use cookies for technical functionality and, with your consent, for analytics. You can withdraw your consent at any time.
Privacy.disclaimer: Disclaimer: This template was created for {name}. It does not constitute legal advice.
